sentences.en: All that she would have to do was warm up the pudding.
sentences.cn: 她所需要做的就是把布丁加热。

sentences.en: Give the pudding a stir so that it won't get burned.
sentences.cn: 搅拌一下布丁,别烧糊了.

sentences.en: He had two helpings of pudding.
I haven't made a pudding today.
I tend to stick to fresh fruit for pudding.
sentences.cn: 我一直坚持用新鲜水果做甜点。

sentences.en: I'm still hungry - can I have some more pudding?
sentences.cn: 我还饿,我可以再要些布丁 吗 ?

sentences.en: It's rained so much that the playground is a real pudding.
sentences.cn: 下了那么多的雨,操场一片泥泞.

sentences.en: Serve the pudding, and pass around a bowl of yogurt to go with it.
sentences.cn: 上布丁，把酸奶碗传一下，用酸奶拌着布丁吃。

sentences.en: The coffee flavour complemented the richness of the pudding.
sentences.cn: 咖啡的味道中和了布丁的油腻感。

sentences.en: The friar preached against stealing and had a pudding in his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 〔谚语〕口里仁义道德,心里男盗女娼.

sentences.en: The pudding is quick and easy and needs little attention once in the oven.
sentences.cn: 这种布丁做起来简单快捷，放到烤箱里之后就不用操什么心了。

sentences.en: The pudding will thicken as it cools.
sentences.cn: 这道布丁菜凉了就会变稠.

sentences.en: They served apple pudding for dessert.
sentences.cn: 他们端上了苹果布丁作为甜食.

sentences.en: This is a mould of pudding.
sentences.cn: 这是在模子中做成的布丁.

sentences.en: We found the English treacle pudding too good to resist. Sure enough, it was delicious.
sentences.cn: 我们觉得英国糖蜜布丁太好吃了，令人无法抗拒。的确非常美味。

phrases.tran_cn: 圣诞布丁（一种干果布丁）

trans.tran_cn: （一道）甜食，甜点心，布丁（通常用面粉经烘烤或蒸煮做成的美味甜食品），肥胖而迟钝的人，[航]船尾碰垫
trans.tran_en: a hot sweet dish, made from cake, rice, bread etc with fruit, milk, or other sweet things added
